an4.167:1.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto yenayasma mahamoggallano tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata mahamoggallanena saddhim sammodi.
an4.167:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam mahamoggallanam etadavoca:
an4.167:2.8: Imasam, avuso, catunnam patipadanam katamam te patipadam agamma anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuttan”ti?
an4.167:3.3: Dukkha patipada dandhabhinna, dukkha patipada khippabhinna, sukha patipada dandhabhinna, sukha patipada khippabhinna.
an4.167:3.5: Imasam, avuso, catunnam patipadanam yayam patipada dukkha khippabhinna, imam me patipadam agamma anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuttan”ti.
